comments.body: Using the fallback as release script can be used to build any Spark refs (see GIT_REF) where could be no Gemfile at all.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +334,338 @@  cd docs
  # TODO: Make configurable to add this: PRODUCTION=1
  if [ ! -f "Gemfile" ]; then
    cp "$SELF/Gemfile" .
    cp "$SELF/Gemfile.lock" .
